meanings.definition: The quality or state of being obvious.
meanings.sent1: The obviousness of the situation made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the concept with such obviousness that everyone grasped it quickly.
meanings.sent3: The obviousness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The obviousness of the solution was like a bright light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The obviousness of the mistake was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being readily perceived or understood.
meanings.sent1: The obviousness of her emotions was clear from her facial expressions.
meanings.sent2: The obviousness of the answer made the quiz seem too easy.
meanings.sent3: The obviousness of the riddle left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The obviousness of the truth hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The obviousness of the danger made them retreat quickly.
